title: Help Me
body: I cant even play on the new client no more i played it b4 in beta but one day i couldn't play any more. here is A vid of me showing whats going on when i try to update . I have tried reinstalling many times and nothing works but now that the other client is gone i cant even play someone pls help me!

replies.body: While a reinstall can help in case of missing files, this can also happen if a security setting is blocking files from being accessed.  Try out the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure league is being allowed to access game files.  Thanks for the video, and let me know if that helps!
Did you check "Reinstall" and "Clean Uninstall" when using the Tool?
